data.outcome_description: At 11:36 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma turned off the kettle.

data.narrative: At 11:36 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava reaches for the kettle and flicks the switch to off, silencing its high-pitched whistle. The cloudy morning light filters in through the kitchen window, casting a soft glow on the clean countertops. She can still hear the distant rumble of city noise, a constant backdrop to her life in Long Island City. The news about potential storms makes her grateful she decided against the park, at least for now.

data.details: Make a cup of chamomile tea.

data.outcome_description: At 11:36 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma began making a cup of chamomile tea.

data.narrative: At 11:36 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava begins the familiar ritual of making chamomile tea. She opens a neatly organized cupboard and retrieves her favorite ceramic mug (mug_cupboard_01), its surface adorned with a calming blue floral pattern. The aroma of dried chamomile flowers wafts up as she tears open a tea bag (tea_bag_box_01) from its box. A quick glance out the window confirms the persistent cloud cover, reinforcing her decision to stay in.

discovered_objects.name: Ceramic Mug
discovered_objects.description: Her favorite ceramic mug, adorned with a calming blue floral pattern.

discovered_objects.name: Chamomile Tea Bags
discovered_objects.description: A box of chamomile tea bags.
